title: Ticket #2210: condor_history crashes on long constraint expressions
description:
Condor_history uses a 512-byte static buffer to hold the constraint expression used to filter which jobs are displayed. If the user provides an expression longer than this length, condor_history will probably crash.

This will affect the blahp when it submits to Condor. As part of its monitoring of job status, it invokes condor_history with a long constraint expression listing all of the clusterids it's interested in.
